original_text: “‘They must not shave their heads or let their hair grow long, but they are to keep the hair of their heads trimmed.
korean_text: 그들은 또 머리털을 밀지도 말며 머리털을 길게 자라게도 말고 그 머리털을 깎기만 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: They must not shave their heads
or let their hair grow long,
sentences.korean_translation: 머리털을 길게 자라게 해서도 안 되며

sentences.original_text: the hair of their heads trimmed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 머리의 머리털을 잘 다듬은 상태로
